post.content:
KOTRA 토론토 KBC에서는 LS 전선을 대신하여 R&D 전문 인력을 모집하고 있습니다.
캐나다 동포 여러분의 많은 관심과 참여를 부탁드립니다.
지원하시고자 하는 분은 이력서를 chrislee@kotra.ca로 보내주십시요.
문의사항이 있으신 분은 416-368-3399 X 228로 연락을 주시기 바랍니다.

감사합니다.


EMPLOYER: LS Cable

• Cable Manufacturer
• Nov. 2003: Spun off from LG Group
• Mar. 2005: Company name changed to LS Cable
• Sep. 2005: Construction of LS Industry Complex in Wuxi, China completed
• Nov. 2006: Commenced construction of second cable plant in Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
• Dec. 2007: Completed construction of second cable plant in Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
• Dec. 2007: Developed the Korean first power transmission submarine cable
• July. 2008: LS Cable split into LS, a holding company, LS Mtron for the machinery and electronic business, and LS Cable for the cable business
• Aug. 2008: Acquired all of shares of Superior Essex, US
• Feb. 2009: Wined the largest submarine power grid project in Korea, being the first Korean cablemaker contracted in an international tender

JOB TITLES: 4 different R&D positions available

1. Research in field of automation for precision mechanical system
2. Industrial Rubber Research
3. Research in field of Polymer synthesis (Ph.D.)
4. Research in field of Metal Forming (Ph.D./M.Sc.)

RESPONSIBILITIES, SKILLS & REQUIREMENTS:

1.Research in field of automation for precision mechanical system
• Theoretical background in design & automation for precision  
    mechanical system
• 3D CAD & Structural analysis of mechanical system        
• Design & Automation of large-scale production machine
• Involved in R&D Project for reliability tests
• 5 years or more in related fields after receiving M.Sc. Degree
• Ph.D./M.Sc. Degree in Mechanical Engineering

2. Industrial Rubber Research
• Compound development and structural characterization of rubber or
   polymeric materials
• Skilled in development and compounding of rubber or polymeric
   materials
• Experienced with various structural characterization techniques of
   rubber or polymeric materials
• Ph.D. in Rubber/ Polymer engineering and science

3. Research in field of Polymer synthesis
• Polymer synthesis (Condensation Rx.)
• Ph.D. in Polymer synthesis (Condensation), Polyimide synthesis,  
   Polyimide solution processing

4. Research in field of Polymer synthesis
• Theoretical and experiment background in metal forming Process
   analysis and product design by using commercial analysis codes:  
   Deform 3D, Superforge, etc
• Analysis of metal flow including extrusion and drawing
• Component design for forming machine
• Involved in R&D Project for metal forming
• 5 years or more in related fields after receiving M.Sc. Degree
• Ph.D./M.Sc. Degree in Analysis & Design for metal forming process

SALARY & BENEFITS:
• Min. US$ 40,000/year(Negotiable)
• Employee insurance
• Housing
• Transportation

Location of Position: LS Cable R&D Centre, Gyeonggi-do, South Korea
Application Deadline: Please forward resume & GTR form to KOTRA Toronto by June 1st, 2009.
Contact: Mr. Chris Lee, Business Development Officer
65 Queen St. W. Suite 600, P.O. Box 9, Toronto, ON, M5H 2M5
Telephone: 416-368-3399 x.228 Fax: 416-368-2839
Email: chrislee@kotra.ca
